GameObject.KindOf: SELECTABLE IMMOBILE CAN_CAST_REFLECTIONS STRUCTURE FS_FACTORY AUTO_RALLYPOINT NOT_AUTOACQUIRABLE UNIQUE_UNIT COVER FS_WAR_FACTORY AUTO_ACQUIRABLE_BY_AI

AnimationState.Script: Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev ~= "STATE_ReallyDamaged" and Prev ~= "STATE_ReallyDamagedOpening" and Prev ~= "STATE_ReallyDamagedWaitingOpen" and Prev ~= "STATE_ReallyDamagedClosing" and Prev ~= "TRANS_DamagedToReallyDamaged" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_DamagedToReallyDamaged") end
